body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Coleman Auto. My name is Billy Coleman. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Evelyn. Can I have your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you please provide me with your phone number with the area code included?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Evelyn. Is there anything else you'd like to inform me about today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I think that's all for now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Evelyn. If you require any further assistance, don't hesitate to contact us. Have a wonderful day!
